metadata.title: USN-3960-1 -- WavPack vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that WavPack incorrectly handled certain DFF files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3960-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libwavpack1 - 5.1.0-2ubuntu1.3 libwavpack-dev - 5.1.0-2ubuntu1.3 wavpack - 5.1.0-2ubuntu1.3 No subscription required
